name: Ninja Vampire Hunter
description:
Fight with Takeo (a Vampire Hunter Ninja) against zombies, werewolves, ghosts, wraiths and abominations. All of them led by a powerful vampire who wants to destroy humanity.

He uses powerful ninja weaponry to triumph over the monster army.

-Ninja martial arts.

-Ninja sword.

- Shurikens.

-Ninja bombs.

Enjoy pixel graphics and the best 80s synthwave music in this action packed retro game.

You can also play its 20 levels with your bluetooth controller.

If you activate the "blood" option, you may suffer some slowdown in the game, it will depend on your processor.

Texts in:

English

Spanish

Portuguese

German

French
